page.title: 12LOWER FARM
page.content:
Lower farm is in icomb. just at the begining of icomb. it has not many sheep and lambs. or cattle. it normally has fresians and one bull. it does not take them long to do the sheep shearing because there is not many sheep. they do not have pigs or chickens. the drive is very bumpy. my dad works on the farm so does mr. hunt.my grandad just does like pulls lambs out of sheep. it is hard work to do this because you need to keep the sheep still. they have three felds to harvest. we borrow mr teags harvester the farm house is very old.
STUART COOK
